meanings.definition: A colorless sugar compound used in sunless tanning products.
meanings.sent1: I applied dihydroxyacetone lotion for a tan.
meanings.sent2: The dihydroxyacetone in the tanning spray gave me a bronzed look.
meanings.sent3: The dihydroxyacetone in the lotion made me look like a beach goddess.
meanings.sent4: Her skin glowed as if kissed by the sun, thanks to dihydroxyacetone.
meanings.sent5: The dihydroxyacetone transformed her pale skin into a golden hue.

meanings.definition: A chemical compound with two hydroxyl groups and a ketone group.
meanings.sent1: The scientist studied the structure of dihydroxyacetone.
meanings.sent2: Dihydroxyacetone is commonly used in the production of certain chemicals.
meanings.sent3: The dihydroxyacetone molecule looked like a tiny building block under the microscope.
meanings.sent4: The reactivity of dihydroxyacetone surprised the researchers.
meanings.sent5: The unique properties of dihydroxyacetone make it valuable in chemistry experiments.
